name=Puy du Fou historical theme park
price=€31 for adults, kids €22. Booking in advance will give a 3 euro discount.

content=With over 1,5 million visitors a year, this is one of the most popular attractions in the whole of France. It has 5 main attractions, including a birds of prey show and a Roman style gladiator fight and a number of smaller ones. All spectacles are in French, but for the main ones electronic translators are available. During peak season, there's a regular "Cinescene", a huge show depicting 700 years of history in the region, but you'll need to book separate tickets for it.

The language here is much the same as the rest of France, with more northern than southern influences  due to the influences from Paris, and  basic French will be easily understood.
Travellers wishing to see more of the Loire Valley can continue further east into the adjoining
region, studded with additional historical cities and chateaux at sites such as
